newsitem.title: VENEZUELA: Venezuela 9-mo tax revenues 5 pct ahead of target.
newsitem.headline: Venezuela 9-mo tax revenues 5 pct ahead of target.

text.p: Venezuela's non-oil tax revenues over the first ten months of the year were 5.3 percent ahead of target at 2.006 trillion bolivars ($4.27 billion), tax superintendency Seniat said.
"But if tax revenues from oil are added in, tax collection until October stands at 2.909 trillion bolivars," the agency said.
Non-oil tax targets for year-end stand at 2.465 trillion bolivars, Seniat added. It did not provide comparative 1995 figures.
